verbose_text: Using the double-transgenic line Tg [Atoh1a :d Tomato; ET (krt4 : EGFP) sqet4] to simultaneously visualize Atoh1a expression and hair cells, we extended these previous observations by finding a broad but weak Atoh1a in supporting cells, which stabilizes and becomes stronger in UHCPs and in young hair cells (XREF_FIG E).
